title: Bug 120922: Dirty Page behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: Dirty Page behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved (including the quotes). The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error' (including the quotes).
OB: When editing XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message is 'Source page is dirty.'
EB: A better and more typical approach would be to inform the user that the XML Report Design has been changed and provide a clear prompt to save or discard the changes. The dialog should use a better title and should not include quotes.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the XML Report Designer. 2. Edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor. 3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. Note the error message indicating that the changes need to be saved.
